title: Project Manager
caption: Coordinates the entire CRO process, ensuring seamless integration and alignment across all team activities

title: CRO Strategist
caption: Develops a strategic plan to achieve the CRO project’s goals and is responsible for creating data-driven hypotheses for validation through experimentation

title: UX Researcher
caption: Conducts user sentiment analysis through surveys, usability tests, and interviews to identify user drivers, concerns, frictions, and intents. This UX research forms the foundation for winning CRO/UXO hypotheses

title: Data Engineer
caption: Creates an advanced data capture and storage architecture to enable data analysis and generate robust, data-driven hypotheses

title: Data Analyst
caption: Develops quantitative data analytics models to analyze funnel performance and identify user behavior patterns. This analysis is essential for defining the focus of the CRO project

title: Designer
caption: Integrates CRO-driven design principles with your brand’s existing design language and tone, crafting interfaces that resonate with your audience and drive conversions

title: Copywriter
caption: Creates content that not only matches your brand’s voice but also employs CRO-best practices to significantly improve user engagement and conversion rates

title: Developer
caption: Codes alternative UX variations based on CRO hypotheses to be validated through experimentation

title: QA Specialist
caption: Guarantees that your website performs flawlessly, aligning with CRO strategies to ensure a perfect customer experience across all platforms
